definition.procedurexml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><comment h="121" pinned="false" w="330">Code Locations:
Logic
Custom Variables
World Procedures -> Actions
Text
Entity -> Actions</comment><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GTE</field><comment h="67" pinned="false" w="383">First you are going to check if you have enough mana to use the spell.</comment><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">global:Mana</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">99</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">global:Mana</field><comment h="121" pinned="false" w="189">Then, you are going to subtract however many mana/magic points from your player once this spell has been used.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">global:Mana</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1000</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="spawn_entity_with_rotation"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:Dragon</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="yaw"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="entity_send_chat"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">If you don't have enough mana then display that to you</comment><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Not enough mana!</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
